CustomField.description: To be derived from the Account Type and Status Mapping - see Workflow for Accounts and Req.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Conga - Restricted Prospect"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Imported Draft")),"n/a", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Conga - Restricted Prospect"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Draft")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Conga - Restricted Prospect"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Validation Pending")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Conga - Restricted Prospect"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Rejected")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "CMD"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Active")),"High", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Conga - Validated"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Rejected")),"High", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Legacy Migrated Account"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Draft")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Legacy Migrated Account"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Validation Pending")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'External', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "Legacy Migrated Account"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Rejected")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'P40_Account', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "P40"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Active"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_group__c, "0005"))),"Mid", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'P40_Account', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "P40"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Active"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_group__c, "0005")),"Low", IF(AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'One_Time_Load', ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_type__c, "One Time Load"), ISPICKVAL(SHS_Account_status__c, "Active")),"Mid", NULL))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Certain Contracts require High or Mid level values in order to activate the agreement, refer to Contract Type Reference Guide.
CustomField.label: Account Trust Level
